attributes.action: Insist that Car Companies Create "Green" Cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To be honest, I am trying my hardest to be a person who is "Green" and believe me I am not the type of person that I would have thought would be doing this, but I am sick of people telling me to be greener when I can't see any direct input from the Government. If it is that crucial and the planet is going to die because of us then why don't the Government insist that car companies only make "Green" cars, or other measures that would save this planet. Why am I bothering to do all I can when the Government aren't?
